column1: Smoque BBQ////While it can't be said that the food at Smoque can truly compare to the stuff you can find in
column4: it's more than good enough to satisfy both connoisseurs and newcomers to BBQ
column5: and you'll find a little bit of everything on the menu. How about a Texas style sliced brisket sandwich with a side of BBQ Beans? Or a slab of St. Louis style ribs with fresh cut french fries and mac and cheese? Everything
column6: whether it was an entree or a side
column7: was consistently fabulous each time I went. Unless you're not into smoky tasting food or meat in general
column8: there's really nothing to complain about.
